DOC.brief_summary: Primary Aim - Evaluate whether human embryo exposure physiologic level oxygen culture improve percentage woman deliver baby follow vitro fertilization embryo transfer . Hypothesis test : Physiologic oxygen tension embryo culture , approximate oxygen tension fallopian tube uterus , improve live birth rate clinical In Vitro Fertilization Embryo Transfer ( IVF-ET ) . Secondary Aims Evaluate whether human embryo exposure physiologic level oxygen culture vitro fertilization embryo transfer - improve embryo cleavage - improve clinical pregnancy rate - reduce multiple pregnancy rate - reduces miscarriage rate Hypothesis test : Physiologic oxygen tension embryo culture , approximate oxygen tension fallopian tube uterus , improve embryo cleavage clinical pregnancy rate reduce miscarriage rate clinical IVF-ET .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Physiologic Oxygen Tension Clinical In Vitro Fertilization Outcomes
